events.message: I received the wrong item and I would like to request a refund because this product does not match my order.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about the wrong item.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you got the wrong item. I will assist you with the refund process as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived this morning.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the wrong item.
Thank you for the quick response and refund arrangement. I appreciate your help in resolving this matter promptly.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure that you have received the refund and that the return process is going smoothly.
Since there’s been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our support team.
